website_summaries.verdict: An exfoliating soap bar with high quality ingredients that is worth the extra cost.
pros: Features organic Shea butter, olive oil, freshly ground coffee, oats, and essential oils
The coffee and oats exfoliate gently while the bar itself has a pleasant smell and lasts a long time
cons: This bar is a bit pricey since you only get one bar of soap

customer_reviews.title: Coffee and oatmeal less than oils, vanilla, spice (but good moisturizer)
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I had unrealistic expectations. I was hoping the coffee smell would wake me up in the morning. Now that I have the soap, I find the coffee is in the middle of the ingredients list and the actual smell of the soap is vanilla, spices, and soap. Maybe when it's wet or makes contact with skin it smells less like soap and more like the other ingredients? Top ingredients are oils that are good moisturizers. Seems like a decent soap, just not as coffee-tastic as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is wonderful! My skin is tighter, smoother, and softer than ever at 48 years old. UPDATE: If I could go back and redo this review I would only give it one star. When I first bought this is was finely ground and I loved it! Now I HATE IT!! The coffee beans and oatmeal are very coarsely ground and scratch my skin more than exfoliate it.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: This is great soap. I'm a guy so I don't usually ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great soap. I'm a guy so I don't usually worry too much about which soap I use. This soap is just really cool. I find myself ordering more of them on Amazon vs just buying whatever is at CVS. That tells me that I clearly like it. The coffee sent wakes you up and the oatmeal bits help clean you up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Tech Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best exfoliating soap we’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: I almost wish I hadn’t tried this soap because now, we can’t do without it. It’s exfoliating action is on the heavy side which we like (and I have fairly sensitive skin) plus somehow it leaves you with a smooth moisturized feeling, the oils in it I guess. In any case my husband and I both use it and added it to our subscribe and save so we will always have some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosierchic

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I have sensitive, combination, acne prone skin. Can you imagine how hard it it to find something that works for me? I started to use this and it worked but dried it out too much so now i use it with Dove soap. And my face is finally bump free. Even using makeup is not enough sometimes because you can still see the bumps. I am so grateful for this simple soap. I feel like i have hope with my skin. Use it. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best soap I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Love their products. It really changed the dark marks on my face. I started out with turmeric then i bouth this one and the honey kind. Im kind of addicted to these soaps once i noticed the difference. I want to try every kind they have At first i was only putting it on my face then i started putting it on my body and noticed the difference after i did that
customer_reviews.author: Niesha

customer_reviews.title: Never Had a Chance - Its the smell
customer_reviews.text: A coffee and oatmeal soap bar should not smell like cinnamon or spice or at all. I missed this information on the box and did not see it explained anywhere else. Just thought I try something else but I will stick with Dr. Squatch's coffee soap. Smells like chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Marauder

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like the smell and it exfoliates as I expected. But for this particular bar, black seeds (coffee) gets all over the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Kailee

customer_reviews.title: Soft exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: It exfoliates softly, unlike other "soaps" where it damages the skin with the roughness. The oatmeal and coffee grinds are easy to rinse off, but might not be appealing to some. The ground coffee in it is just for scent, if you plan on buying it thinking it's a caffeine alternative to wake you up, it won't.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Telling all my friends and family about it
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to use this soap and can I say I am absolutely hooked! Not only does it make your skin feel smooth and actually clean, but it leaves such a nice scent. Makes my bathroom smell amazing too ! Once this one is done I definitely want to try other ones from this company
customer_reviews.author: kendrix fonts

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap, smell and texture, it is just that it goes quickly maybe after four uses .
customer_reviews.author: Fern flower

customer_reviews.title: but this is so much better. It has a good feel and smell to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used liquid soap for years, but this is so much better. It has a good feel and smell to it and a rough enough texture to get really clean after working outside in the garden or garage, but leaves your hands feeling moisturized afterwards. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Brown

customer_reviews.title: Threw it away early - too scratchy
customer_reviews.text: This sounded great in theory but in reality the bar was super scratchy, I think, b/c of the actual oatmeal. lol plus it is an exfoliating bar but it was simply too scratchy and harsh for my liking. I think I ended up throwing it away early. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Can I rate this 6 stars?
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing! It's really course (beware if you don't like this), and it smells great! I do wish you could smell the coffee, but it does smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and light exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: Little goes a long way. I like to cut off a small piece to make product last longer. Really nice coffee and cinnamon smell with a light exfoliation. I recommend you apply toner and moisturize directly afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. It smells good enough to eat. When I walk in my bathroom I immediately smell my soap. It has a really soft lather and makes my face feel so clean. I will be ordering it every time I run out. I use it for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent
customer_reviews.text: Smells like heaven. This soap really exfoliates your skin revealing nothing but clean and beautiful skin. You feel the grains but it's not too harsh for your skin. The combination of oatmeal and coffee does the trick helping with problem skin such as cellulite and dryness. What a way to wake up and start your day :-)
customer_reviews.author: Scorpbabe

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soap. I was hesitant because it is kind of expensive. But I love the exfoliating coffee in it. It smells so good and leaves my skin glowing and fresh!!! I continue to try and find soap cheaper but I nothing compares. It’s my favorite hands down and I will just suck it up that it’s expensive! But you can’t argue with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Stone

customer_reviews.title: Love this Soap!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite soap! I love the coffee grounds and exfoliators in the bar. It smells terrific and I will be ordering more. So good. You have to give it a try! Sincerely Thankful, Tina
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good soap. Has all the organic qualities one would ...
customer_reviews.text: Good soap. Has all the organic qualities one would expect. It is not however super fragrant. Don't buy if that's what you think your going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Dial

customer_reviews.title: Will order again when needed!
customer_reviews.text: I abso-freaking-lutely live this bar! It's perfect for the morning face wash! Wakes me and my face up!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell and i'm not a fan and I didn't really see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: KayOh

customer_reviews.title: Just started using but very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely soap, feels soft and creamy to skin. Just started using but very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Teleco

customer_reviews.title: Coffee and oatmeal soap
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this soap to everyone.. The scent is wonderful and very good for the skin.. Delivered on time.. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Gail I Miller

customer_reviews.title: This soap has saved my skin!
customer_reviews.text: This soap has changed my skin. I have very dry, flaky skin and have tried just about every type of soap, scrub, etc, over the year. This one is the only one that keeps my skin soft, and flake free! I can wear black again!
customer_reviews.author: erinkingen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice spice scent... not too overpowering. I love the coffee grounds scrubbies too. I’m on my 2nd bar 😃
customer_reviews.author: agrey23

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap! Lasts a long time...am in the process of buying my third bar, that's how much I love it! I use it as a body soap in the shower. I have very sensitive skin and have no issues with this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Soap!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap! It has a great smell that is invigorating and the bar exfoliates wonderfully. I bought these for friends as presents when we stayed in a vacation cabin in the Sierra's.....everyone loved them! I will be re-purchasing and buying more as gifts soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Best Soap Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, the texture and how well it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: lese

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner alternative to coffee scrubs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a less messy alternative to coffee scrubs because my shower would be stained and dirty looking after using them! Very scrubby & so much cleaner! Buying again. The only reason I gave it a 4 is because it does leave a bit of a draggy residue on your skin
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McBride

customer_reviews.title: I love the unique smell of cinnamon or maybe cloves
customer_reviews.text: I love the unique smell of cinnamon or maybe cloves? Every time I use this product it always keeps me guessing. The soap lathers very well. It is honestly one of, if not, my favorite soap and I will continue to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Allen Krammes

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap but it doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, feels great on skin. But for the cost ($8.99 + tax per bar), it just doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Sirius Lee Bakoff

customer_reviews.title: This is a great exfoliating soap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great exfoliating soap. It's not too rough but it works. I liked it so much I have ordered more for my family as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: This soap smells amazing! Makes me want to go have a glass ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells amazing! Makes me want to go have a glass of chia tea everytime I smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: This bar is super exfoliating! My only problem with it is that it doesn't seem like it will last very long and was rather expensive.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Wittas

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar of soap so much that I already bought another! My boyfriend loves it, too. If you’re hesitating, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product, I have sensitive skin so I’ve been looking for a soap that can be accommodating to that & I think I’ve finally found it. I will definitely be ordering from this company again & I’d advise anyone who is considering to make the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: So much better than what you find in stores!
customer_reviews.text: This is great soap! Smelled beautiful, worked great in the shower (both exfoliating and cleaning) and lasted a long time! Definitely solid quality soap. Buying again!
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love all natural products. Im in the process of trying various ones to see what and whos i enjoy most. Tha k you for getting away from the processed and chemically altered products.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this products. It is the perfect exfoliator for the face. Very gentle abrasion with a warm vanilla scent. It has already helped with brightening my skin and fading my dark spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMFG
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! One of my favorites so far. When I walk in my shower room the first thing is I smell the soap on its dish. This soap is hands down. This is was I look forward to us everytime I'm in the shower room. Thank you again amazing! !
customer_reviews.author: JeannelleDean

customer_reviews.title: Yummy smell!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! But deffinitely will exfoliate you, its scratched me easily & left some marks but they fade in like 5-10 min, wasnt a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Burnette

customer_reviews.title: disappointing scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent was awful and the bits of coffee in the shower were annoying

customer_reviews.title: Good Soap!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was looking for an ex foliating soap and this fits the bill perfectly! Good quality as well.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this soap!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing! I love love love the exfoliating and the way it softens my skin. Highly recommend! It’s always in stock and very much worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Angel Petty

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's not the soaps fault but apparently I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's not the soaps fault but apparently I'm highly allergic to it. Used it once last week and I'm covered in a rash! The rash is even on the soles of my feet ☹ Went straight to the trash. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Skin very soft
customer_reviews.text: It leaves my skin very soft. make a cream for after the soap
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Astorga

customer_reviews.title: Number 1
customer_reviews.text: Is the most effective coffee scrub/soap I have ever used in my body skincare regime . I highly recommend , I was able to see my skin smoother and brighter within a few uses. Thanks Aspen Kay!
customer_reviews.author: Millicent

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the smell. Great exfoliant too. I love that it's made with all organic ingredients and essential oils. I use it for the keratosis pilaris on the back of my arms, and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Dead Sea bar and this one and THIS was my favorite. The smells are perfect for a calming shower. And the lather is abundant and is so so smooth. Love it so much I’ll be reordering. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome soap bar. It smells good and has a great clean feel after. The price and size is excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this is my favorite soap I have tried so far! Great lasting smell!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the smell! Literally how I want breakfast to smell all the time. Perfect for washing your face in the morning, not for removing make up.
customer_reviews.author: Mac456

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing. It is great for exfoliating and smells amazing. My girlfriend and I both love it. It has helped me get rid of acne and has improved the skin on my face especially. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Had a lingering skin rash and this soap helped clear it up within 24 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My first bar was a gift, afterwards I was hooked!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: High quality soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells amazing 😉 and I love ❤️ that it exfoliates my skin. My skin is very soft & I feel like I’m at the spa everytime I use it.

customer_reviews.title: I expected it to smell like coffee but
customer_reviews.text: Exfoliates very well. I expected it to smell like coffee but, sadly it does not. More like a strong cinnamon smell.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: The Aspen Kay Naturals coffee and oatmeal exfoliating soap lives up to its description. The fragrance is wonderful. The soap lathers up well and the coffee grounds create an exfoliating rub. The soap leaves skin feeling clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: great soap
customer_reviews.text: me and my husband love this soap, cleans and smells amazing.. second time purchasing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of exfoliate!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is exactly what I've been looking for! It's the perfect amount of exfoliate without stripping away my skin. The bar's smell is wonderfully awakening. I'll definitely order this product again!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok it's good for scrubbing roughly I didn't love it it's ok

customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing, it gets the job done, and i feel amazing afterward; ive bought this multiple times and yet to be let down

customer_reviews.text: This soap smells wonderful and really keeps my skin smooth.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin look and feel wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soap! Makes my skin look and feel wonderful. I do wish it smelled like coffe though.

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap. It leaves my skin feeling healthy and smelling clean.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bar of Soap!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it has a notable cinnamon scent and unfortunately the person I bought it for hates cinnamon. It's a great bar but I wish it smelled mainly of coffee. It's very moisturicing and exfoliating though

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. It smells good and leaves you feeling clean and fresh but not slippery. I plan to be a regular customer.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product..
customer_reviews.text: I've used only for a few days, but so far, it is great....

customer_reviews.title: Best soap I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the product it smell & feels amazing

customer_reviews.title: Quality soap bar
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, smells good and feels good on the skin. Very effective!

customer_reviews.title: and leaves behind excellent moisture without greasiness
customer_reviews.text: Soap has the right amount of exfoliating granules to remove rough skin without irritating, and leaves behind excellent moisture without greasiness. Excellent product!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Soap works amazing, smells great, and lasts forever! Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent soap. Will be buying more in the future ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soap. Will be buying more in the future as gifts. The scent is not overbearing and leaves my skin feeling very nice.

customer_reviews.text: Great soap! I use it with an exfoliating scrubby in the shower. Hydrating and smells great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and how it made my skin feel soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Soaps Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these soaps!!! They smell so good with the essential oils and yet the smell doesn't remain on my skin after I shower. This one is my favorite as I love the exfoliating properties. I also gave them to all the women on my Christmas list and they love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to dry my skin but I love the exfoliating!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter's Grove

customer_reviews.title: After one week clear skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the soap because I started to show dark marks around my upper cheek area on my face. I just started using this soap for a week now and it has shown me results fast, I will continue to use this soap as it helps replenish my skin back to looking smooth and giving me back my even tone skin.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia freeman

customer_reviews.title: who cannot stop talking about how wonderful it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend, who cannot stop talking about how wonderful it is. So I'm buying another one for him. My only complain is the price - $8.99 is ridiculous for a bar of soap!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderfull.  Exfoliates quite well.
customer_reviews.text: If you spent any of your youth in the 90's then you are familiar with Fireballs. If you are fan of Fireball jaw breakers (candy) or if you are a classless alcohol consumer who has the mentallity of a 15 year old kid and enjoy Fireball or After Shock then suffice to say that you will be quite pleased with the scent. The bar is really quite wonderful. I will be making another purchase in the future as I have been trying a variety of coffee infused products lately.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Mac

customer_reviews.title: A truly great, natural product.
customer_reviews.text: I love Aspen Kay Naturals! I have used their bar shampoos and conditioners for well over a year and LOVE them. They use certified sustainable palm oil, which helps in replantation to reduce the environmental impact of deforestation. There is such a high quality to their products and you can just tell how much passion goes into it! This coffee soap is incredible. It exfoliates nicely with the oats and smells SO. GOOD. I use it just about every day and can really tell that it is making my legs/arms smoother. You truly won't be disappointed in any of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you have acne 🤔
customer_reviews.text: If so, BUY THIS SOAP!! I have PCOS. Biggest side effect is acne 😩!! This soap will exfoliate your face so well it's like you never had a pimple! I only use this soap for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the black charcoal soap cleanser, so I had to get the whole bar collection. I don’t like unnecessary chemicals on my face and body, so I tried something new and Love the ones I’ve tried. I’m excited to try the others and help my skin get back to soft and hydrated skin with a glow. Recommended highly personally!!!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Another great soap from Aspen
customer_reviews.text: This bar is good at what it does. Smells of coffee and spice with a roughness that successfully exfoliates skin without leaving too dry. If you use more than once every few days it may leave your skin a bit dry though. I'm definitely going to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: really strong smell. not a coffee and oatmeal fragrance and....
customer_reviews.text: not what i expected at all. thought i was ordering a coffee and oatmeal fragrant exfoliating bar of soap. instead i received a warmed spiced and sweet vanilla fragrance that is so over whelmingly strong and sweet that it makes me nauseous. didn’t even use it on my body because the smell through the box makes me sick to my stomach. reminds me of old spice x10. needless to say, i will not purchase again - this cannot be an all natural soap imho.
customer_reviews.author: oRAVENo

customer_reviews.title: Buy again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased twice because it did an amazing job exfoliating. I love the ingredients because everything is natural and safe. I did not really smell the coffee as much as the spice. But i would like one with more of a cafe scent that has less spice if that is possible :) i’d buy really quick. And really great price
customer_reviews.author: Jonell

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliating soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing. It is rough enough to exfoliate. I like the scent too. It’s not messy at all. I used to make my own coffee scrub which is supposed to be geat for cellulite and stretch marks but this soap is better and doesn’t leave a mess in the bathtub. I’ll definitely purchase it again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This soap is my new favorite. It smells AMAZING the coffee and oatmeal pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is my new favorite. It smells AMAZING the coffee and oatmeal pieces are great exfoliators; I ended up using it over an area that was slightly sunburned and the skin healed right away. Did I mention how good it smells? So worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kalene

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using it a few days, but it seems to have potential to be a good exfoliating bar. It has a good grit to it from the coffee grounds, but it’s not too harsh. It smells like black licorice to me, but I didn’t see that listed in the ingredients. The smell is not bad and it fades quickly although I kind of hope it really does contain licorice because licorice is known to help with dark spots. I’m using the soap to help with KP on my legs and the back of my forearms. I will update when or if I see results with that. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby purchased this for me as a gift. It smells nice, that’s about all I can say good. It’s very rough! Scratched my skin all up! Doesn’t foam up much so it was difficult trying to get it onto a body scrubber to use. I was so excited to try it but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This soap is amazing! I love the exoliating oatmeal and coffee grounds
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing! I love the exoliating oatmeal and coffee grounds. It smells like almond and cinnamon. The lather is shockingly amazing for bar soap. This also has kaolinite which has been shown in some clinical studies to reduce the amount of pathogenic bacteria on the skin as well as absorbing skin oils.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Gift for husband. He liked the scrubby feel and the scent. His skin is mildly sensitive and he was happy with this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: No breakouts and last long if you put it in soap holder when wet. I love this soap!
customer_reviews.author: Gidget Monroe

customer_reviews.title: WAKE ME UP SHOWER BAR !!
customer_reviews.text: OOOHH I love this Breakfast Bar. And so do my daughters and nieces. Great morning "wake my lazy butt up" shower bar. While the coffee maker is brewing, so are you in the shower !!
customer_reviews.author: DonateLife

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Checked all the boxes for my husband. Organic, exfoliating, doesn't dry out his skin and smells great! It's the only soap he uses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Coffee & Oatmeal Exfoliating Soap, 100% Natural and Organic Soap. With Organic Skin Loving Oil. A Wonderful Exfoliating Body Soap, For Men & Women. GMO Free. 4 oz Bar.… (Coffee Soap 1 Pack)
feature_bullets: Made With Certified Organic Freshly Ground Coffee, Certified Organic Oats and Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils, This is a Wonderful Exfoliating Soap.
With certified organic shea butter, certified organic olive oil, certified organic and sustainable palm oil, certified organic castor bean oil and certified organic sunflower oil.
All of our soaps are made, cut and packaged by hand in small batches to ensure quality of each and every bar of soap.
We are confident you will love our soap. If you are not satisfied for any reason, it's ok! Just send the package our way and you will receive a full refund of your purchase price.
